snippet: The House is expected to consider a comprehensive overhaul of open records that would require the government to create a single online portal for requests to any government agency.
abstract: House is expected to take up largest overhaul of government's open records law since 2007; legislation, which has broad bipartisan support, is aimed at speeding and streamlining open records access by mandating creation of single online portal for requests to any government agency.
lead_paragraph: The House is expected to consider a comprehensive overhaul of open records that would require the government to create a single online portal for requests to any government agency.

headline.main: House to Weigh Overhaul of Open Records Process
headline.print_headline: House to Weigh Overhaul of Open Records Process

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
